title: why are the red tree runes so much better than the blue tree?

I personally don't believe that the Domination tree is better than Sorcery in every application. If you think about how you should be trading with your champion, or your personal preference then that can determine which if best. Thing is the game favours burst champions atm so Domination is going to be a highly chosen, and powerful tree.
